name: Carolina Sky Flight Training
about: Carolina Sky Flight Training is a Veteran-owned flight training center located at the Summerville and Moncks Corner Airports in South Carolina. Our team, composed of passionate and experienced aviators, is dedicated to providing top-notch flight instruction in a supportive and collaborative environment. With a focus on excellence, we offer personalized guidance and mentorship to each student. Our fleet includes modern Diamond aircraft, known for their industry-leading safety record and advanced avionics. We also utilize the Redbird simulator to enhance training efficiency and safety. Our instructors are highly qualified, and our program is designed to help students achieve their FAA certifications efficiently. We take pride in fostering a community that ensures each student receives the best possible training to reach their full potential as future aviators. Join us at Carolina Sky Flight Training to embark on your aviation journey with trusted leaders and dedicated instructors.
